name: The Major's Footlocker
description: I have another job. It's.. about my mom. Those First Wave sites I sent you to before? I actually hoped you'd find something of my mother's. She fought in the Raider resistance. It was a long shot; but now I've got an actual lead.
objectives: Search for Major Aiva's mementos in the apartments northwest of The Dam
Deliver Major Aiva's Mementos to Tian Wen
